channel.title: 2 interfaces at the same time

item.title: 2 interfaces at the same time
item.dc:creator: @MrMud MrMud
item.description:
@MrMud wrote:

Im making a tutorial island on my rsps. I want this result:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZwP6Ku-oQE&feature=related
a character creation screen and a ‘getting started screen’.
so ive coded that, but when it should be shown, my client shows only the character interface. this is my code

[code]public static void GettingStarted(int a) {
Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[a];
c.sendFrame164(11891);
c.sendQuest(" @blu@Getting started", 11893);
c.sendQuest(" To start the tutorial use your left mouse buttons to click at the", 11894);
c.sendQuest(" Runescape Guide in this room. He is indicated by a flashing", 11895);
c.sendQuest(“yellow arrow above his head. If you can’t see him, use your”, 11896);
c.sendQuest(“keyboard’s arrows keys to rotate the view.”, 11897);
}

public static void CharacterCreation(int a) {
	Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[a];
	c.showInterface(3559);
}[/code]

and the command

if (cmd.startsWith("test")) { Tutorial.GettingStarted(1); Tutorial.CharacterCreation(1); }
how can i fix this??
the base is U-Rune

Read full topic
